GSD37vaikhd_u:418: vā tam an.āturo jale -avagāhya-ācamya \spṛśet). tataḥ sa pūto \bhavati).
GSD37vaikhd_u:420: prāṅ.mukhaḥ pratyaṅ.mukhaḥ vā sthitvā caturaśra.upalipte maṇḍale śuddhaṃ pātraṃ \nyaset).
GSD37vaikhd_u:422: Vaikh 02.14.(131.7-9)/ dvau pādāv ekaṃ vā bhūmau nidhāya prasannaṛtaṃ tvā satyena \pariṣiñcāmi)-iti sāyaṃ \pariṣiñcati). satyaṃ tv artena\pariṣiñcāmi)-iti prātar.
GSD37vaikhd_u:423: Vaikh 02.14.(131.9-11)/ amṛta.upastaraṇam asi-ity ādhāvaṃ pītvāvidhinā prāṇa.āhutīr hutvā-annam anindann \aśnāti).

GSD37vaikhd_u:439: go.kṣīraṃsadā-ekaśapha.uṣṭra.strīṇāṃ payaś ca pala.aṇḍuka.vakala.śuna.gṛñcana.viḍjam anuktaṃ\reading uncertain Cal p.132n.1)/ matsya.māṃsaṃ ca varjanīyaṃ.
GSD37vaikhd_u:441: Vaikh 02.15.(132.8-9)/ udakyā.spṛṣṭaṃ śūdra.anulomaiḥ spṛṣṭaṃ teṣāmannaṃ ca \varjayet).

GSD37vaikhd_u:482: Vaikh 03.02.(134.1-2)/ nagnāṃ paras triyaṃ viṇ.mūtre ca na \paśyed).
GSD37vaikhd_u:490: Vaikh 03.02.(134.5-6)/ parakṣetre carantīṃ gāṃ dhayantaṃ vatsaṃ ca
GSD37vaikhd_u:493: Vaikh 03.03.(134.7)/ akṣaiḥ krīḍāṃ preta.dhūmaṃ bāla.ātāpaṃ ca\varjayet).
GSD37vaikhd_u:519: readsaṃśupaṭṭa- in his tr. p.216)/ śrīphalaiḥ śaṅkha.śukti.gośṛṅgāṇi
GSD37vaikhd_u:523: Vaikh 03.04.(135.9)/ gotṛpti.karaṃ bhū.gataṃ toyaṃ doṣa.vihīnaṃ su.pūtaṃ.

GSD37vaikhd_u:536: kuśa.idhma.ādīnagni.arthaṃ śāka.mūla.phalāny aśana.arthaṃ ca śucau jātāny
GSD37vaikhd_u:538: Vaikh 03.05.(136.2-3)/ anya.adhīnam anya.utsṛṣṭam aśucau jātaṃ gorasaṃca
GSD37vaikhd_u:546: tyajan-jaṭā.śmaśru.roma.nakhāni dhārayaṃs trikāla.snāyī dharā. āśayo vanyair eva caru.puroḍaśān
GSD37vaikhd_u:548: śleṣmātakaṃ vrajakaliṃ citrakaṃ śigruṃ bhūs tṛṇaṃ kovidāraṃ mūlakaṃ ca\varjayati).

GSD37vaikhd_u:555: vasan vanastha.āśrameṣu gṛhasthānāṃ gṛheṣu vā bhikṣāṃbhikṣitvā-ambu.pārśve
GSD37vaikhd_u:557: Vaikh 03.05.(137.2)/ śarīraṃ śoṣayann uttaram uttaraṃ tīvraṃ tapaḥ

GSD37vaikhd_u:568: grāmād bahir vivikte maṭhedeva.ālaye vṛkṣamūle vā \nivaset).
GSD37vaikhd_u:569: Vaikh 03.06.(137.10)/ cāturmāsād anyatra-ekāhād ūrdhvam ekasmin deśe na
GSD37vaikhd_u:572: Vaikh 03.06.(137.11-13)/ tridaṇḍe kāṣāya.ap.pavitra.ādīn yojayitvā kaṇṭhe vāma.hastena dhārayan dakṣiṇena bhikṣā.pātraṃ gṛhītvā-ekakāle
GSD37vaikhd_u:574: Vaikh 03.06.(137.14)/ bhūmau vīkṣya jantūn pariharan pādaṃ \nyased).
GSD37vaikhd_u:580: Vaikh 03.07.(137.18)/ bhikṣā.kālād anyatra para.veśma na gantavyaṃ.
GSD37vaikhd_u:582: Vaikh 03.07.(137.19-138.3))/ bhikṣāṃ caritvā toya.pārśveprakṣālita.pāṇi.pāda- ācamya-ud u tyam ity-ādityāya-ato devā iti viṣṇave brahma jajñām iti brahmaṇe ca bhikṣā.agraṃ dattvā
GSD37vaikhd_u:585: prāṇayātrā.mātram aṣṭau grāsān vā-\aśnīyāt). kāmaṃ na-\aśnāti).
GSD37vaikhd_u:590: Vaikh 03.07.(138.6-8) saṅgaṃ tyaktvā niyama.yamī priyaṃ satyaṃ vadansarvabhūtasya-avirodhī samaḥ sadā-adhyātma.rato dhyāna.yogī nārāyaṇaṃ paraṃ brahmapaśyan dhāraṇāṃ \dhārayed).
GSD37vaikhd_u:594: tṛṇair antarīkṛtya śuddhair brāhmaṇair yantreṇa vā saṃnidhāya
GSD37vaikhd_u:595: samudra.gāmyāṃnadyāṃ tīre vā saikate deśe sṛgāla.ādibhir aspṛśyaṃ yathā tathā-avaṭaṃ \khanati).
GSD37vaikhd_u:597: śāyayitvā vā dakṣiṇe haste vaiṣṇavair mantrais tri.daṇḍaṃ saṃnyasya savye yad asya pārerajasa iti śikyam ap.pavitram udare sāvitryā bhikṣā.pātraṃ
GSD37vaikhd_u:598: guhyapradeśe bhūmir bhūmimiti kāṣāyaṃ mṛd.grahaṇīṃ kamaṇḍaluṃ ca saṃnyasya
GSD37vaikhd_u:602: Vaikh 03.08.(139.2-6)/ āhitāgner agnīn ātmany āropya saṃnyasino mṛtaṃdehaṃ
GSD37vaikhd_u:603: gāyatryā snāpayitvā pūrvavad vāhayitvā śuddhe deśe nidhāya laukika.agnau
GSD37vaikhd_u:604: tadagnim \upāvaroha)-ity avaropya pavitraṃ ta-iti ghṛta.kṣīram āsye prakṣipya pūrvavattri.daṇḍa.ādīn vinyasya brahmamedhena pitṛmedhena
GSD37vaikhd_u:614: sarvapāpa.mṛtasya-adāhyānām anyeṣāṃ bhikṣoś ca-ekādaśa.dinād ūrdhvaṃ mahāpātakināṃ pañcānāṃ dvādaśa.saṃvatsarād ūrdhvaṃsapiṇḍīkaraṇa.sthāne
GSD37vaikhd_u:620: Vaikh 03.09.(139.16-150.2)/ agniṃ paristīrya-agner vāyavyāṃ viṣṭaredarbheṣu tad.rūpaṃ suvarṇaṃ vā saṃsthāpya puruṣaṃ dhyāyann oṃ bhūḥ puruṣam ity -ādyaiḥprāṅ.mukhaṃ devaṃ nārāyaṇam āvāhya-āsana.pādya.ācamanāni \dadyāt).
GSD37vaikhd_u:633: avyaktāya sarvakāraṇāya yajña.īśvarāyayajñātmane viśvebhyo devebhyaḥ sarvābhyo devatābhyaḥ sādhyebhya-ity antaiḥ pāyasaṃ baliṃ\dattvā)- ājyam
GSD37vaikhd_u:637: dvādaśa.mūrtiṃ dhyāyann upadaṃśa.ghṛta.guḍa.dadhi.phala.yuktaṃ śvetam annaṃ bhojayitvāyathā.śakti suvarṇaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ \dadāti).

GSD37vaikhd_u:648: Vaikh 03.11.(141.7-8)/ brahmaṇo mukhād udbhūtā brāhmaṇā brāhmaṇyaś ca
GSD37vaikhd_u:652: Vaikh 03.11.(141.10-11) vidhi.hīnam anya.pūrvāyāṃ golakohartṛkāyāṃ kuṇḍaś ca viprau dvau ninditau \syātāṃ ).
GSD37vaikhd_u:653: Vaikh 03.11.(141.11-12)/ tasmād adho bāhubhyāmāt kṣatriyāt kṣatriyāyāṃ vidhivat-jātaḥ kṣatriyaḥ
GSD37vaikhd_u:658: Vaikh 03.11.(141.15-142.1)/ adhastād ūrubhyāmād vaiśyād vaiśyāyāṃ tathā vaiśyaḥ śuddho.

GSD37vaikhd_u:671: Vaikh 03.12.(142.9)/ abhiṣiktaś cet-nṛpo bhūyād aṣṭāṅgam āyurvedaṃbhūta.tantraṃ vā \saṃpaṭet).
GSD37vaikhd_u:678: Vaikh 03.12.(142.14-15)/ kṣatriyād vaiśyāyāṃ madguḥ śreṣṭhitvaṃ prāpto mahānarma.ākhyaś ca vaiśya.vṛttiḥ kṣātram karma na-\ācarati).
GSD37vaikhd_u:690: Vaikh 03.13.(143.7-9)/ kṣatriyād viprakanyāyāṃ mantravat- jātaḥ sūtaḥpratilomeṣu mukhyo-ayaṃ mantrahīna.upanīto dvijadharma.hīno.
GSD37vaikhd_u:695: Vaikh 03.13.(143.11-13)/ vaiśyād brāhmaṇyāṃ māgadhaḥ. śūdrair apyabhojyān no- aspṛśyaḥ sarvavandī praśaṃsā.kīrtana.gāna.preṣaṇa.vṛttir.
GSD37vaikhd_u:697: Vaikh 03.14.(143.14-15)/ vaiśyān nṛpāyām āyogavas tantu.vāyaḥ paṭa.kartā
GSD37vaikhd_u:701: Vaikh 03.14.(143.16-17)/ śūdrāt kṣatriyāyāṃ pulkasaḥ kṛtakāṃ vāārkṣāṃ vā
GSD37vaikhd_u:704: Vaikh 03.14.(144.1-2)/ śūdrād vaiśyāyāṃ vaidehakaḥ śūdra.aspṛśyastair apy
GSD37vaikhd_u:709: sarvakarma.bahiṣkṛtaḥ pūrvāhṇe grāma.ādau vīthyām anyatra-api malāny apakṛṣya bahir \apohayati).
GSD37vaikhd_u:711: Vaikh 03.14.(144.6-7)/ madhyāhnāt paraṃ grāme na \viśaty)/ ayaṃ.
GSD37vaikhd_u:720: Vaikh 03.15.(144.12-13)/ ambaṣṭhād viprāyāṃ nāvikaḥsamudrapaṇya.matsya.jīvī samudra.laṅghanāṃ nāvaṃ \plāvayati).
GSD37vaikhd_u:721: Vaikh 03.15.(144.13-14)/ kṣatriyāyām adhonāpito nābher adho roma.vaptā.
GSD37vaikhd_u:736: Vaikh 03.15.(145.4-5)/ tasmān nikṛṣṭe sute samutpanne patito naṣṭoghorān
GSD37vaikhd_u:740: Vaikh 03.15.(145.6-8)/ tasmād brāhmaṇādyāḥ savarṇāyāṃ vidhivat putram \utpādayeyur)-iti vikhanāḥ. End of the text.
